Tim Barber

I'm a professional .NET Architect specialising in creating Enterprise Applications. I'm passionate about software craftsmanship, SOLID principles and best practises. I'm also enjoying learning about non-microsoft technologies and I've recently developed an interest in photography.

Blog

Welcome to my first blog post on Jekyll

I've needed to sort out my blog for a long while. I'd had dreams of writing my own, in .NET and then ruby, but I never got around to it. Now I'm thinking why re-invent the wheel? So I was looking for a new solution.
